scripts.install: npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.build:client: cd client && npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: cd server/prisma && npx prisma generate && cd ../.. &&  npm run serverAndClient
scripts.production: pm2 start server/build/index.js && pm2 start client/app.config.json
